Brookhaven.Emory Healthcare: Emory Healthcare is the largest health care system in the state of Georgia., United States. Emory Healthcare is a multidisciplinary academic medical organization comprising six hospitals, the Emory Clinic and more than 200 provider locations. The Emory Healthcare Network, established in 2011, is the largest clinically integrated network in Georgia with more than 2,000 physicians concentrating in 70 different subspecialties.
